title: Exercise green!
creator_credit: Kingcroft Productions, Terry Ohlsson and Philip Bond
brief_description: A simulated full scale military, naval and air force assault exercise from planning through victualling, sappers’ engineering, parachuting and shelling followed by a computer analysis of the entire operation.
